data.name: Fantasy Tales Online - Frontier Pack
data.detailed_description:
Jump start your Fantasy Tales Online quest with the Frontier Pack which includes :

  • 1 Month Subscription (Grants magic find, Exp boost, Extra space, Faster crafting time)
  • 2 Large Bags (16 Slots)
  • 5 Crate Keys (Used to Unlock Rare Treasures)
  • 5 Costume Tokens (Save your favorite appearances)
  • 5 Respec Tokens (Allows you to re-distribute talent points)
  • 450 Gems (Currency used for Cash Shop)

Items will be delivered to your account bank upon purchase.

Note: These items will be bound to your Steam Account only. They are non-transferable, and will not work on non steam accounts.

data.short_description: Jump start your Fantasy Tales Online quest with the Frontier Pack which includes : 1 Month Subscription (Grants magic find, Exp boost, Extra space, Faster crafting time), 2 Large Bags (16 Slots), 5 Crate Keys (Used to Unlock Rare Treasures), 5 Respec Tokens (Allows you to re-distribute talent points), 450 Gems (Currency used for Cash Shop

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium D or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or equivalent with OpenGL 1.5+ Drivers
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Java 6 Release 45

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.7.5 (Lion)
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo or later
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or equivalent with OpenGL 1.5+ Drivers
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Java 6 Release 45
